cons: These people are those with kidney problems, most commonly, chronic renal failure or those who are under kidney dialysis treatment.
Insomnia, hiccups, agitation, muscle weakness, confusion, consciousness disturbances, and seizures have been reported by people after ingesting the fruit.
description: It carries a small amount of minerals and electrolytes like potassium, phosphorus, and zinc and iron.
Potassium is an important component of cell and body fluids helps controlling heart rate and blood pressure.
Star fruit contains zinc which reduces a tendency towards acne breakouts.
name: Star(Carambola)
pros: It carries a small amount of minerals and electrolytes like potassium, phosphorus, and zinc and iron.
Potassium is an important component of cell and body fluids helps controlling heart rate and blood pressure.
Star fruit contains zinc which reduces a tendency towards acne breakouts.
The fruit is high in dietary fiber, Vitamin C, copper, pantothenic acid and potassium.
It is low in saturated fat, cholesterol and sodium.
The fruit helps in lowering cholesterol.
It prevents and treats constipation as it helps add bulk and moisture to feces.
It helps in managing symptoms of jaundice.
